seniority_level.evidence: Job title explicitly states 'Senior Data Engineer' and requires 4+ years experience with 2+ years focused on data infrastructure, aligning with senior level expectations

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Senior Data Engineer' and responsibilities focus on data pipelines, orchestration, storage, and infrastructure - core data engineering functions

sub_specialty.evidence: Strong emphasis on ETL/ELT, data orchestration tools (Dagster/Airflow/Prefect), and data warehousing (Athena) with streaming mentioned only as 'nice to have'

leadership_expectation.evidence: Role focuses on technical implementation and collaboration without mention of managing people or teams; 'contribute to formation of new team' suggests IC contribution to team norms, not people management

primary_cloud.evidence: AWS explicitly mentioned as primary cloud platform with specific services like Athena and CloudFormation listed in must-have skills

secondary_clouds.evidence: Azure and GCP mentioned as alternatives in qualifications ('AWS or other public cloud platforms'), indicating multi-cloud awareness but AWS as primary

processing_paradigm.evidence: Batch processing emphasized through ETL/ELT and orchestration tools, while streaming platforms (Kafka, Kinesis) are listed as 'nice to have', suggesting hybrid capability

orchestrator_category.evidence: Dagster, Airflow, and Prefect explicitly listed as required experience in data orchestration tools

storage_layer.evidence: Mention of Iceberg (lakehouse format) alongside data lake technologies and data warehousing (Athena), indicating lakehouse architecture approach

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Boston, MA with hybrid model requiring in-office presence on core days (Tuesday/Wednesday), indicating regional restriction

timezone_focus.evidence: Boston, MA location and hybrid work model with core days suggest Eastern Time zone focus, placing it in Americas region

relocation_required.evidence: Hybrid model requiring in-office presence on core days in Boston, MA implies relocation may be necessary for candidates not already in the area

h1b_friendly.evidence: No mention of visa sponsorship in the job posting, and 'not_mentioned' in Pass 1 extraction for visa sponsorship

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support, and requirement for 4+ years experience suggests not targeting recent graduates on OPT/CPT

citizenship_required.evidence: No explicit citizenship requirement mentioned, but hybrid work model in Boston, MA implies need for work authorization in the US

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position with comprehensive benefits package including equity and retirement benefits, typical of W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: Mentions comprehensive total rewards package, equity, annual bonus, medical, retirement, lifestyle benefits, and free SimpliSafe system - indicating premium benefits

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Company description mentions 'learning and growth are continuous' and 'collaborative and agile environment', but no specific career tracks or promotion paths are detailed

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions working with analysts, engineers, product managers, and stakeholders, and 'collaborative environment' suggests learning from others, but no formal mentorship program mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotion opportunities, advancement paths, or career progression in the job posting

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or opportunities to explore different roles within the company

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) mentioned in the job posting or company description

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-have and nice-to-have skills, with reasonable requirements for senior level (4+ years experience, specific technical skills) without excessive demands

scope_definition.evidence: Focused job description centered on data engineering responsibilities with specific technical requirements, not combining multiple roles or ambiguous duties

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements align with senior data engineer level (4+ years experience, cloud, SQL, Python, ETL, orchestration tools) without unrealistic expectations for junior roles
